maqras.text: 19|22|geulihayeo geunyeoneun ingtaehago meolli tteol-eojin gos-eulo olmgyeogassdeola
19|23|chulsan-ui jintong-i simhayeo geunyeo neun jonglyeonamu julgie gidaego malha gil ijeon-e jug-eobeolyeossdamyeon joyonghi ij-eobeolil su issneun il-inde
19|24|geuttae jonglyeonamu mit-eseo cheonsa ga geunyeoleul buleudeoni seulpeohaji mal la ne junimkkeseo ne mit-e heuleuneun naesmul-eul dusyeossnola
19|25|jonglyeonamu julgileul nega issneun jjog-eulo hondeul-eola geuleomyeon jal ig-eun yeolmaega neoegelo tteol-eojilini
19|26|meoggo masieo ma-eum-eul pyeong-anke hala geuligo nega salam-eul mannageo deun jeoneun hananimkke dansighal geos-eul maengsehayeoss-eumae oneul nuguwado mal-eulhaji anh-eul geos-ila malhayeola
19|27|eolma hu geunyeoga adeul-eul angoseo salamdeul-ege natanani maliayeoneoneun isanghan geos-eul gajigo wassguna lago jolonghadeola
19|28|alon-ui nu-iyeo neoui abeoji neun nappeun salam-i anieossgo ne eomeonido bujeonghan yeojaga anieossnola
19|29|geuleoja geunyeoneun geuaeleul galeu kyeossdeola ittae moduga yolam-an-e iss neun agiwa eotteohge mal-eul halan mal-i nyo lago malhadeola
19|30|agiga malhagil naneun hananim-uijong-eulo geubunkkeseo naege seongseoleul jusigo naleul yeeonjalo taeghasyeossseubnida
19|31|jega eodie issdeon jeojeul chugbog bad-eunjalo hasyeossgo jega sal-a issneun han yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul ba chila jeoege myeonglyeonghayeossseubnida
19|32|jeoui mochin-ege hyodohala hasyeossgo jeolo hayeogeum geomanhaji anihagobulhaengham-i eobsdolog hasyeossseubnida
19|33|jega tansaenghan nalgwa jega imjong haneun nalgwa jega sal-aseo buhwalhaneun nal-e jeoege pyeonghwaga issdolog hasyeoss seubnida
19|34|geugeos-i balo maliaui adeul yesue daehan iyagilo igeos-eun geu deul-i nonjaenghaneun geos-e daehan jinliui malsseum-ila
19|35|hananimkkeseoneun adeul-eul gajil pil-yoga eobsnola geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss eusoseo geubun-i eotteon geos-eul wonhasil ttae malsseum-eul naelisini iss-eola geuleo myeon issneunila
19|36|jinsillo hananim-eun naui junim iyo neohui junim-isini geubun man-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i gajang baleun gil-i la
19|37|geuleonde geudeul gaunde mulideul i uigyeon-eul dallihani widaehan simpan ui nal bulsinhaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
19|38|geudeul-i hananim-egelo oneun nal geudeul-eun bunmyeonghi deul-eul geos-imyeo ttobunmyeonghi bolila geuleona oneul-ui eo liseog-eun jadeul-eun bunmyeonghi banghwanghage doelila
19|39|geudeul-ege gotong-ui nal-eul gyeong-go hala geudeul-i mid-eum-eul geeulli hal ttaeil-eun gyeoljeongdoeeojinola
19|40|jinsillo hananim-eun daejiwa geu wie issneun modeun geos-eul sangsoghanani geudeul moduneun hananim-egelo gwiuihanola
19|41|seongseoan-e issneun abeulaham-eun jinsilhan yeeonjayeoss-eum-eul sang-gisikila
19|42|geuga geuui abeojikke wae deud jido moshago bojido moshamyeo dangsin kke hyoyongdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issseubnikka
19|43|abeoji dangsinkke ileuji moshan jisig-i jeoege ileuleossnani jeoleul ttaleusibsiyo jega abeojileul baleun gillo annaehagessseubnida
19|44|abeoji satan-eul seomgimyeon ani doebnida sillo satan-eun hananim-eul bae banhayeossseubnida
19|45|abeojiga hananim-eulobuteo beol-eul bad-a satan-ui chinguga doelkka dulyeobseubnida

19|46|ittae abeojikkeseo daedabhasa abeulaham-a neoneun naui sindeul-eul silh-eohaneunyo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon naega neoleul dollo ttaelil geos-ila geuligo nalobuteo olaesdong-an tteol-eojyeo issge halila
19|47|abeulaham-i abeoji pyeong-anhasoseo abeojileul wihae junimkke yongseoleul bilgessseubnida junim-eun jeoege jabileulbepusyeossseubnida
19|48|jeoneun yeoleobundeulgwa hananim oe e yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul tteo na jeoui junimkke gido deuligessseubni da junim-e-ui jeoui gidoneun chugbog-eul bad-eul geos-ibnida
19|49|geuga hananim anin daleun geos-eulsungbaehaneun geudeul-eul beoligo tteonass-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege isaggwa yagob ol jueo geudeullo hayeo yeeonjaga doege hayeossnola
19|50|hananim-eun geudeul-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eossgo jinsil-ui mallo geudeul-eul nop yeossnola
19|51|seongseosog-e issneun daelo mose-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun seontaegbad-eun-yeeonjaimyeo seonjijaieossnola
19|52|hananim-eun sinai san upyeon-e seo geuleul bulleoss-eumae sinbiui yaegileul nanugi wihae hananim-eun geuleul gakka i bulleossnola
19|53|hananim-i geuui gido-e eunhye leul bepusa geuui hyeongje alon-eul yeeonjalo dueossnola
19|54|seongseosog-e issneundaelo iseuma-el-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun yagsog eul jikineun chungsilhan jalo yeeonjai myeo seonjija ieossnola
19|55|geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege yebae leul deuligo iseullamseleul bachil geos-eul chogguhasa junimkkeseoneun geulohayeo gippeohasyeossnola
19|56|seongseosog-ui ideuliseuui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun jinsilhan yeeonjaieossnola
19|57|geulihayeo hananim-eun geuleul nop eun wichie dueossnola

19|58|ideul-eun adam-ui jasondeul gaunde hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun yeeonjadeul-ila geu jung-eneun noawa hamkke bangjue oleun jaga iss-eossgo abeula hamgwa iseula-el jason-i iss-eumyeo geu jung-eneun hananim-i olh-eun gillo indo han jaga iss-eumyeo seontaeghan jaga iss-eossnola hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege gyesidoeeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun buboghago gyeongbaehayeo nunmul-eul heullyeossnola
